dcterms:creator: Van-Duc Le
Tien-Cuong Bui
Sang-Kyun Cha
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset of air pollution and spatiotemporal related factors collected from Seoul city for three years, from 2015 to 2017, including air pollution values in monitoring stations and various meteorological and traffic factors.
dcterms:title: Seoul Dataset (2015-2017)

dcterms:creator: Van-Duc Le
Tien-Cuong Bui
Sang-Kyun Cha
dcterms:description: An expanded dataset that includes air pollution data and spatiotemporal factors collected from Seoul city over a five-year period, from 2015 to 2019, which is 75% larger than the previous dataset.
dcterms:title: New Seoul Dataset (2015-2019)
